feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: Harden Speaks From China, Newly Signed Extensions, Team USA at the World Cup, and ESPN Sets New Broadcast Teams - Season 2 Episode 35

link.title: Harden Speaks From China, Newly Signed Extensions, Team USA at the World Cup, and ESPN Sets New Broadcast Teams - Season 2 Episode 35

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack delve deep into the James Harden vs Daryl Morey fiasco in Philly. They also talk contract extensions for Anthony Davis and Josh Hart and discuss Team USA’s World Cup chances. They wrap the show by giving their thoughts on ESPN’s NBA broadcast teams and the newly released regular season schedule.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Jaylen Brown Gets a Record-Setting Bag, Dame and Harden Are Still Waiting for Trades, and the Future of Donovan Mitchell - Season 2 Episode 34

link.title: Jaylen Brown Gets a Record-Setting Bag, Dame and Harden Are Still Waiting for Trades, and the Future of Donovan Mitchell - Season 2 Episode 34

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack discuss Jaylen Brown receiving the biggest contract in league history and all the pressure on the Celtics this year. They also talk about Damian Lillard and James Harden, as both are still hoping for trades before the start of the season, as well Donovan Mitchell, and whether or not he’ll sign a contract extension in Cleveland.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Dame and Harden Trade Requests, Free Agency Recap - Season 2 Episode 33

link.title: Dame and Harden Trade Requests, Free Agency Recap - Season 2 Episode 33

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack discuss the recent news regarding Damian Lillard and James Harden, as both future Hall of Famers have now requested trades. The guys talk about how these situations might play out, and what the potential trade returns could be for both. Then, they recap a wild and rich free agency period, in which over 2 billion dollars have been handed out. Which deals did Jack and Noah like, which confused them, and what teams intrigue them most for this upcoming season?

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Draft Recap, Trades Galore, Naz Reid Extended, and a Look Into Free Agency - Season 2 Episode 32

link.title: Draft Recap, Trades Galore, Naz Reid Extended, and a Look Into Free Agency - Season 2 Episode 32

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack discuss the offseason and all the action across the NBA. They talk about their thoughts on the draft, including Scoot vs Miler, the surprising fall of Cam Whitmore, and their favorite picks of the night. Then they talk about all the recent trades, with Marcus Smart, Kristaps Porzingis, Tyus Jones, CP3, Jordan Poole, and John Collins among those on the move. The guys then finish the show discussing the extension for Naz Reid and give some predictions for free agency, which starts Friday evening (which is also Noah’s birthday)!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: The Bradley Beal Blockbuster, Potential Zion Trades, Morant Suspension, and Harden’s Future - Season 2 Episode 31

link.title: The Bradley Beal Blockbuster, Potential Zion Trades, Morant Suspension, and Harden’s Future - Season 2 Episode 31

entry.content:
It’s draft week, and the NBA offseason is in full swing. In this episode, Noah and Jack discuss the Bradley Beal trade, the new big 3 in Phoenix, and the Wizards now entering a full rebuild. They also talk about the rumors swirling around Zion Williamson and James Harden, and the 25 game suspension for Ja Morant.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: CP3 and the Suns, Lebron and Kyrie Rumors, Ja’s Suspension, and Ranking Great NBA Finals Performances - Season 2 Episode 30

link.title: CP3 and the Suns, Lebron and Kyrie Rumors, Ja’s Suspension, and Ranking Great NBA Finals Performances - Season 2 Episode 30

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Noah and Jack are joined by Lucas Jafet, host of the Share the Rock podcast. They discuss the rumors surrounding Chris Paul and his future in the Phoenix, the possibility of Kyrie Irving once again teaming up with LeBron James, and Adam Silver’s comments on Ja Morant. They also talk about these NBA Finals and rank some of the best individual games we’ve seen on basketball’s biggest stage.

In addition to listening to this podcast episode, be sure to tune in after each NBA Finals game for the One on One Instagram live show. Immediately after each game, Noah and Jack give their thoughts about what happened, and these live shows can be found on Instagram @1on1pod https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Celtics Lose Game 7, NBA Finals Are Set, Sixers and Bucks Hire Coaches, and Melo Retires - Season 2 Episode 29

link.title: Celtics Lose Game 7, NBA Finals Are Set, Sixers and Bucks Hire Coaches, and Melo Retires - Season 2 Episode 29

entry.content:
Noah and Jack have officially graduated, and now they’re back to discuss the latest in the NBA. Lots is going on, as Miami sent Boston packing and is now set to face Denver with a title on the line. They also talk about the latest coaching news across the league, and close out the show by honoring Syracuse and Knick legend Carmelo Anthony, who announced his retirement after a 19 year career.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: Conference Finals Preview, Monty Williams Fired, Ja Morant, What’s Next for the Suns, Sixers and Warriors? - Season 2 Episode 28

link.title: Conference Finals Preview, Monty Williams Fired, Ja Morant, What’s Next for the Suns, Sixers and Warriors? - Season 2 Episode 28

entry.content:
And then there were 4…

Jack and Noah are back to discuss Lakers vs. Nuggets and Heat vs. Celtics, a conference finals repeat from the 2020 bubble. They also discuss the futures of Golden State, Phoenix, and Philly after second round exits, and another off-court incident regarding Ja Morant.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: 2nd Round Update, Bucks Say Goodbye to Bud - Season 2 Episode 27

link.title: 2nd Round Update, Bucks Say Goodbye to Bud - Season 2 Episode 27

entry.content:
Now that Noah can talk normally again, he and Jack are back to discuss the conference semifinals. Will the Lakers close out the Warriors? Do the Knicks have a chance to stay alive? And will the 76ers and Nuggets hold their 3-2 leads? They also talk about Milwaukee after firing Mike Budenholzer, and how that franchise moves forward with Giannis.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: 2023 NBA Playoffs Round 2 Thoughts and Predictions - Season 2 Episode 26

link.title: 2023 NBA Playoffs Round 2 Thoughts and Predictions - Season 2 Episode 26

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss all of the second round matchups in the NBA playoffs as the remaining eight teams compete for the NBA title. The guys also briefly discuss Dillon Brooks antics and how it possibly cost him a spot on the Memphis Grizzlies next season!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
